positions.title: Founder
positions.description:
-EdTech Cafe
a bilingual WeMedia platform, strives to bridge the gaps between the Ed Tech insiders through sharing the latest news and groundbreaking work in a way that is friendly for different groups to engage in conversations and brainstorm for solutions.

educations.title: Columbia University in the City of New York

given.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Helen when she was an intern in the Technical Training department during the summer of 2017.

Helen used her strong data analytics skills to manage and evaluate a pilot program with an online learning vendor. She reviewed user data, developed and delivered a written survey and conducted interviews with users to determine the relevance and value this service was providing. Her recommendation at the end of this project was to continue to work with this vendor.

In addition, she conducted analysis on a Technical Training survey to breakdown training request by location. This will enable our department to plan our future training programs.

Throughout her internship, Helen was very conscientious about her work and she listened to feedback and incorporated it into her final presentations and reports.

Her positive attitude, analytical skills and commitment will be a benefit to any future employer. See less

items: 3rd Prize in NYC Foster Care Data Challenge
